title: Volaris Completes Successful Migration to airRM Revenue Management System
text:
SOURCE: Revenue Management Systems, Inc. August 11, 2015 08:00 ET Volaris Completes Successful Migration to airRM Revenue Management System 
SEATTLE, WA --(Marketwired - August 11, 2015) - Revenue Management Systems (RMS) is excited to announce that Mexico's Volaris has successfully completed its migration to airRM the state-of-the-art revenue management, inventory control, and reporting tool developed by RMS. With airRM, Volaris staff can access a huge array of data including: ancillary, competitive fare, web analytic and real-time booking, allocation and availability. 
"Over the past decade, Volaris has firmly established a reputation as a leading ultra-low-cost carrier (ULCC) in Mexico and throughout North America, combining low fares, quality service, and a fresh approach to the ULCC business," said Chris Anthony, Director of Sales and Support AMERICAS. "Today's completion of Volaris' migration to airRM represents the latest milestone in this innovative history. airRM 's suite of cutting-edge and sophisticated modules and tools -- including multiple inventory control methodologies, industry-standard forecasting & optimization, ancillary management, and integration with digital advertising -- will help Volaris achieve even greater success. Indeed, the results delivered with airRM in the early stages of the migration led to an accelerated rollout network-wide." 
"Volaris selected airRM because it is an excellent fit with our ULCC business model. Our two companies share the same commitment to innovation, speed of execution and service," said Holger Blankenstein, Chief Commercial Officer of Volaris. 
More information about Volaris may be found at www.volaris.com . 
Revenue Management Systems, Inc. has been developing airline revenue management systems in cooperation with some of the most successful airlines in the world today. Their most popular product, airRM , is used by over 50 airlines including Ryanair (Ireland), AirAsia (Malaysia) and Jetstar (Australia). airRMexpress , their newest offering, brings affordable forecasting and optimization technology to the hundreds of small airlines around the world. Together, airRM and airRMexpress help airlines realize higher revenues and increased staff productivity. RMS, founded in 1996, is a privately held company headquartered in Seattle, Washington (USA) with offices in Australia, Great Britain, The Netherlands, Spain and Singapore.
